title: Algorithmic Decision Processes. (arXiv:2305.03645v1 [econ.TH])
abstract: We develop a full-fledged analysis of an algorithmic decision process that, in a multialternative choice problem, produces computable choice probabilities and expected decision times.
context:
Title: Algorithmic Decision Processes. (arXiv:2305.03645v1 [econ.TH])
Abstract: We develop a full-fledged analysis of an algorithmic decision process that, in a multialternative choice problem, produces computable choice probabilities and expected decision times.
translated_abstract: 我们开发了一个完整的算法决策过程分析，该过程在多选问题中产生可计算的选择概率和预期决策时间。
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种算法决策过程，可以产生多选问题中的选择概率和预期决策时间。
en_tdlr: This paper presents an algorithmic decision process that generates computable choice probabilities and expected decision times for multi-alternative choice problems.
